lead_paragraph: Subramanian Swamy is arguably the most vicious infighter in the country’s politics, but the question is whether the prime minister can keep him on a tight enough leash.

headline.print_headline: Taking Down Politicians for Decades, and Rising in India’s Government
headline.main: Taking Down Politicians for Decades, and Rising in India’s Government

snippet: Subramanian Swamy is arguably the most vicious infighter in the country’s politics, but the question is whether the prime minister can keep him on a tight enough leash....
abstract: Saturday Profile of Subramanian Swamy, Indian economist who has made reputation for himself as one of most vicious infighters in politics; Swamy, unapologetic Hindu nationalist, has taken series of actions that threaten stability of Prime Min Narendra Modi's government, and question has arisen regarding whether Modi will be able to control him.
